head.title: Read barcodes from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} apps
head.description: With {{ProdShortName}}, extract barcode data from {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{ProgLang}} without any external tools.

header.title: Read barcodes from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Extract barcode content from PDF, Word, Excel, and image files using {{ProdShortName}} in your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides a comprehensive solution for document parsing in {{EnvName}}. It enables developers to extract barcodes, text, images, and structured information from multiple file formats like PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and others—without needing third-party libraries.

formats.title: File formats supported for barcode reading
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} can read barcodes from many document and image types. Below are some of the commonly supported formats.

examples.comment_1: Open a document containing barcodes using {{textParser}}
examples.comment_2: Check barcode support for the file

steps.title: How to read barcodes from {{FileFormatCap}} in {{ProgLang}}

content.title: With [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), {{EnvName}} developers can extract barcodes from {{FileFormatUp}} documents in just a few steps:
content.step_2: Verify the document supports barcode extraction.
content.step_3: Use the API to retrieve barcode data.
content.step_4: Loop through the barcode results and apply them as needed.

more_features.title: More parsing capabilities
more_features.description: {{ProdShortName}} goes beyond barcode extraction—it also lets you extract plain text, images, and structured elements to support data-driven workflows.

feature_1.title: Wide barcode format support
feature_1.content: Detect standard barcode formats including QR Code, Code 39, Data Matrix, EAN, Aztec, and others.

feature_2.title: Read barcodes from multiple sources
feature_2.content: Extract barcode information from Office documents, PDFs, and image files like PNG, JPG, and BMP.

feature_3.title: Custom barcode reading setup
feature_3.content: Fine-tune barcode extraction with options for targeting specific regions and multi-page files.

code_1.title: Example: extract barcodes from PDF with options
code_1.content: This sample demonstrates barcode extraction from a PDF document using custom settings.
code_1.comment_2: Ensure the document supports barcode reading
